name: Far From the Tree (2018)
description: \n                        FAR FROM THE TREE follows families meeting extraordinary challenges through love, empathy, and understanding. This life-affirming documentary encourages us to cherish loved ones for all they are, not who they might have been. Based on Andrew Solomon's award-winning, critically acclaimed, New York Times bestselling non-fiction book \"Far From the Tree: Parents, Children and the Search for Identity.\"\n
